label: 松方正義
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: まつかた まさよし
見出し読み_mod: まつかた まさよし
説明文: (1835-1924). Son of Satsuma goshi turned merchant (Ryukyu trade). Modest official career in Satsuma before 1868; promoted hirazamurai, 1863. After 1868, posts in local and central government; finance expert; eventually Prime Minister and Genro.
